# kernel.txt
TMP4="rpi4"
TMP4v7="rpi4v7"
TMP3="rpi3"
TMP3v7="rpi3v7"
TMP0="rpi0"
DEF="../defconfig"
PAT="../patches"
CC="../patches/cc"
NC="../patches/nc"
CORES=`nproc`
# do not edit above this line

# kernel
KERNEL="linux-rpi"
VERSION="5.4.y"

# 1 = active
# 0 = inactive
crosscompile=1
menuconfig=0
custom_defconfig=0
# place in defconfig directory
MYCONFIG="nameofyour_defconfig"
